name: Materia Ex Vita Chronicles
description:
You're alone in the night finishing last minute maintenance. You must go to the bunker now. This game is meant to be played with chill. Enjoy!

This game is part of the Materia Ex Vita Chronicles and will be released in chapters. The main game can be downloaded here and is a Space-Sim game https://dante2001.itch.io/mev

If you want to help with the development you can do so on our Patreon here https://www.patreon.com/materiaexvita

I'm usually on Discord, https://discord.gg/B8GyynF

We also have a facebook https://www.facebook.com/materiaexvita/
